api_list.name: Tester of headers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lenguaje.p.rapidapi.com/tester"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lenguaje.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lenguaje.p.rapidapi.com/tester"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lenguaje.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET de conjugación de verbos
api_list.description: Devuelve la conjugación de un verbo en infinitivo

api_list.name: Similarity-Spanish
api_list.description: Obtain Spanish words that are spelt or sound similar to the input word.

api_list.name: Lemmatizer-Spanish
api_list.description: Obtain the lemmas of an input word in Spanish.
